mapper.select: SELECT INDEX_CODE FROM RPT_REPFIELD_DEF_CHANNEL P WHERE P.RPT_NO = '1701' AND GROUP_ID = '0' and index_code=#{subcode}
select group_id, group_name, sub_code, sub_name, user_id, to_char(lst_upd, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') as lst_upd, latn_id from charge.dim_sub_group where latn_id = #{latnId} and group_id = #{groupId}
